name: Puffed Away!
description:
The big bad wolf has gone mad with power! He may have puffed the little pig's house away, but that was only half the story. That's the story they wanted you to hear. This round, little piggie has been puffed away for good. Doomed to be lost in the mysterious forest forever, you can help him find his way home. Just don't become dead meat!

Featuring adorable pixel graphics and three levels of fun.

Team:

Josephine Andrews - Lead Programmer + Level Design

Ruth O'Donoghue - Audio, QA + Game Art

Stephen Hackett-Delaney - Textures + Art
